articles.author: MARCIA DUNN
articles.title: Spacecraft buzzes Mercury’s north pole and beams back stunning photos - The Associated Press
articles.description: A spacecraft has beamed back some of the best close-up photos yet of Mercury's north pole. The European and Japanese robotic explorer buzzed the planet's polar region Wednesday. The European Space Agency released the snapshots Thursday, showing the permanentl…
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) A spacecraft has beamed back some of the best close-up photos yet of Mercurys north pole. 
The European and Japanese robotic explorer swooped as close as 183 miles (295 kil… [+1229 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Marsh, Matthias Williams
articles.title: Musk to host German far-right leader on X, stirs angst about election meddling - Reuters
articles.description: Musk is becoming vocal in his support for far-right and anti-establishment parties across Europe.
